title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.2 - Selection of center
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.2 - Selection of center

State Regulations
(a) A
public or nonprofit private organization desirous of entering into a contract
with the Labor Department for the operation of a multipurpose center for
displaced homemakers shall file its request on a form prescribed by the

Industrial Commissioner. (b) In
evaluating applications, the Industrial Commissioner shall consider, among
other factors, the quality of the applicant's resources and facilities and its
capability of providing the services in accordance with article 23-B of the

Labor Law, this Part and the data contained in the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
630.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
